body_html: @kalle Note that initialize_*local*_variables is not included in initialize_all_variables. If you remove the num_epochs argument, your graph shouldn't have any local variables, which should be why it works in this case. If you are really running initialize_local_variables, then something else seems to be going on.

body: @kalle Note that `initialize_*local*_variables` is not included in `initialize_all_variables`. If you remove the `num_epochs` argument, your graph shouldn't have any local variables, which should be why it works in this case. If you are really running `initialize_local_variables`, then something else seems to be going on.
